title: iSignthis confirms CEO's family own key stake
text:
iSignthis, the ASX-listed payments company, has revealed that the chief executive’s sister-in-law is the company secretary of Red 5 Solutions, the entity which owns more than 10 per cent of the company.

In a statement to the stock exchange, iSignthis, which was suspended from trading last week, provided more details about the issue of performance shares as it sought to respond to speculation that sparked a period of intense sharemarket volatility

Among the points of contention was the beneficial ownership of Red 5 Solutions, which appeared on the share register in the second half of 2018.

The statement said that one of the shareholders of Red 5 is Andrew Karantzis, the brother of CEO John Karantzis, and that the company secretary Irene Naumova is Andrew’s wife.

The company said Andrew Karantzis was one of eight ‘‘angel investors’’ who invested cash into the company and were given rights to shares in iSignthis BVI, which was entitled to performance shares when hurdles were met.
